original_text: So with yourselves, since you are eager for manifestations of the Spirit, strive to excel in building up the church.
korean_text: 그러므로 너희도 영적인 것을 사모하는 자인즉 교회의 덕을 세우기 위하여 그것이 풍성하기를 구하라

sentences.original_text: since you are eager for manifestations of the Spirit,
strive to excel in building up the church.
